_sText:
I was making a my house map but fucking gave up halfway through (by half way through I mean after I made the living room) and started adding random bullshit.
This map includes:

• A nice living room which is ironically where most of the CT's die.

• An ice cream cone, because who doesn't love ice cream.

• A navmesh because this map is SO basic that bots move perfectly.

And that's it. This my first CSS map and my sixth hammer map. I make most of my maps for Half Life 2, which is why this isn't a very good arena. Okay thank you :)

Go go go!
